ygData.subject: RE: spells question
ygData.msgSnippet: Instill fear is great if you are solo and pull 2 MOBs, or if you have no enchanter/bard in your group and need to give the group some time.  One caveat: fear
ygData.messageBody:
Instill fear is great if you are solo and pull 2 MOBs, or if you have no
enchanter/bard in your group and need to give the group some time. One
caveat: fear is BAD in dungeons. The AE fear (wave of fear) is a great
spell later as it can be used to get the MOBs off of the group while the
evac'er gets off his/her ggate.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro

> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> I just made 24, and just bought my spells
> greater healing
> bravery
> wave of fear
> counteract poison
> symbol of Ryltan (and 20 bloodstones)
> dismiss undead
>
> I didn't buy hammer of striking (what a joke), and I didn't buy
> instill fear. Reason being I never used fear. But my question is:
> Is instill fear worth buying? Is there some marvelous tactic using
> the fear spells that I'm not familiar with? I figured wave of fear
> would be really, really handy, but instill fear was kind of worthless
> compared to it, if I understand them correctly. Can someone shed
> some light?
>
> Ergo Soulhealer
> 24th level cleric of Tunare
> test server
